Package org.vowpalwabbit.spark

Class VowpalWabbitNative

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.vowpalwabbit.spark.VowpalWabbitNative
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable
    public class VowpalWabbitNative
extends Object
implements Closeable
    Main wrapper for VowpalWabbit native implementation.
    Author:
    Markus Cozowicz

    • Constructor Detail

      • VowpalWabbitNative

        public VowpalWabbitNative​(String args)
        Initializes the native VW data structures.
        Parameters:
        args - VW command line arguments.

      • VowpalWabbitNative

        public VowpalWabbitNative​(String args,
                          byte[] model)
        Initializes the native VW data structures.

        Note: The args must be compatible with the command line arguments stored in model.

        Parameters:
        args - VW command line arguments.
        model - VW model to initialize this instance from.

    • Method Detail

      • learn

        public Object learn​(VowpalWabbitExample[] examples)
        Invoke multi-line learning.
        Parameters:
        examples - the examples to learn from.
        Returns:
        the one-step ahead prediction.

      • learnFromString

        public Object learnFromString​(String examplesString)
        Invoke multi-line learning. By default will interpret input as text format, pass `--dsjson` or `--json` to initialize to use DSJSON or JSON respectively.
        Parameters:
        examplesString - String representation of examples to learn from.
        Returns:
        the one-step ahead prediction.

      • predict

        public Object predict​(VowpalWabbitExample[] examples)
        Invoke multi-line prediction.
        Parameters:
        examples - the example to predict for.
        Returns:
        the prediction.

      • predictFromString

        public Object predictFromString​(String examplesString)
        Invoke multi-line prediction. By default will interpret input as text format, pass `--dsjson` or `--json` to initialize to use DSJSON or JSON respectively.
        Parameters:
        examplesString - String representation of examples to learn from.
        Returns:
        the prediction.

      • createEmptyExample

        public VowpalWabbitExample createEmptyExample()
        Creates a new empty VW example associated with this this instance. This is used to mark the end of a multiline example.
        Returns:
        new VowpalWabbitExample object.

                                             VowpalWabbitNative[] workspacePointers)
        Merge several models together and return the result. Experimental API.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        merged VW model.
